title: Renektons stun
body:
I'm just sick of having renekton dash in, i spam flash, flash away and am stunned when I land.

I renekton a champion who has that much early potential and psycho damage should maybe have that mechanic fixed. like maybe have it stun....actually I don't know how the mechanics of League work but I am sick of successfully flashing but being stun by a 10 foot crocodile arm.

Maybe its just my ping and he actually stuns me before I flash - but I flash away so seem like bs to me. He's already bs enough.

Thoughts?

replies.body:
Renekton is a champion that deserves respect, and although I see your frustration with the stun mechanic, this is built into nearly every single melee autoattack in the game. 

If you think about it in a way that ranged champions cannot have their attacks dodged by flash after a certain point, so it would be a huge disadvantage to melee champions if their animations were going but the damage and stuns could be avoided. It would be something highly abusable at higher levels for split second animation cancelling during duels, and although it makes sense logically, it could wreak havoc on some game balancing for champions with slower animations and attack speeds versus high mobility champs.

There is however a way which you can avoid being stunned/damaged! If you flash into the fog of war it will completely and instantly cancel the animation, allowing you to walk away. This is the case for most spells/attacks. Keep it in mind!
Good tip with the Fog of war - thanks man.
So true. i'm a renekton main, hes so badass :p

Flashes cannot escape me. (It sounds like he's saying Nasus coz he bites his tongues alot when he talks; side effect of a 2 foot long muzzle and 74-80, inch long teeth - but he says it himself.).

https://i.imgur.com/81qyN1y.jpg

Be aware of his ability to dash a second time if he hits an enemy unit on its 1st cast (450 range)  COOLDOWN: 18 / 17 / 16 / 15 / 14

Also be aware of his ability to switch between putting levels in Q for more sustain/aoe and W for more Damage or even E in rare cases for the Armor shred for all-in trading etc.

Plus if he takes fervor, at level 18 and a 50 fury Ruthless Predator with max Fervor stacks, it will hit for a bonus 240ish damage.

Fight him when his fury's down. Consider Heal shred.

If his attack animation begins, it'll stun you no matter what you do (other than kill him or die). Technically, i think, you hit flash before the stun hits you but due to the windup, your flash doesn't activate until the stun hits.

Renekton is one of the strongest early game champs available which means you'll need to respect him in lane if you hope to get out alive. Depending on who you are playing, it helps if you can poke him down so that he isn't able to all in you (eg Panth's Spear Shot) or use a readily available escape move when he dashes in (eg Shen's Shadow Dash). If the match up isn't very favourable you might need to flash earlier since Ren's Ruthless Predator is a super quick auto attack reset.
You need to make sure he cannot dash through one of your minions in the first place man. Play at a safe range and engage on him when his dash is down because its got a fairly high CD
